author: scottbw
msg: Replaced the specific license content in template config.xml with generic ASL 2.0 boilerplate with blank copyright to be filled in by the widget author (also fixed spelling of "license"). For each of the example widgets, created a config.xml with the ASF license. See WOOKIE-246
